section.title: Dashboard log files
section.para: The dashboard is served to users through the Apache web server (httpd).
As a result, dashboard-related logs appear in files in the /var/log/httpd or /var/log/apache2 directory on the system where the dashboard is hosted. The following table describes these files:

tr.td: Logs all attempts to access the web server.
Logs all unsuccessful attempts to access the web server, along with the reason that each attempt failed.
